shadow.name: SERIOUSNESS
shadow.description: Heavy burden of purpose, joyless striving
shadow.behavioral_signature: Grim determination, no play or levity
shadow.somatic_signature: Heavy body, collapsed posture, energetic density
shadow.thought_pattern: Life is hard work. I must push through.

gift.name: DELIGHT
gift.description: Finding joy in the process, body as instrument of pleasure
gift.thought_pattern: My body is designed for delight. I follow what feels good.

siddhi.name: ECSTASY
siddhi.description: The body as temple of divine bliss

diagnosis.distortion: Believing the Body is Obstacle, Not Vehicle

inversion_protocols.script: Your depression is not about your circumstancesâ€”it is about your relationship with your body. Gate 46 is the gate of serendipity through the body. You have made the body a beast of burden rather than a source of delight. When you move toward pleasure, the body lights up. Follow what feels good.
inversion_protocols.somatic_anchor: Stand up. Stretch. Move in ways that feel pleasurable. Follow the body's desire for sensation.

experiment.hypothesis: If I prioritize bodily pleasure for 7 days, mood will lift.
experiment.action: Daily: Do at least 3 things that bring physical pleasure (stretch, dance, warm bath, good food, etc.).

success_criteria.target: Increased moments of lightness, reduced heaviness
